title: Studio, Kitchen breakfast bar, Refrigerator, Landscaped courtyards
posting_body: Set in the heart of North Hollywood, The Marquee Apartments is everything you could ever want.

With proximity to everything from the sandy Southern California coastline to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of Los Angeles, your most difficult decision will be how to spend the weekends.

Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Refrigerator-Carpeted flooring available Select units-Oversized closets with built-on shelving-Garbage disposal-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Kitchen breakfast bar-Two-tone designer paint
